doc.description:
Class dealing with date manipulation
examples: test/loredana/time

name: bbn\Time

setInterval.name: setInterval
setInterval.summary: Define the property $interval instantiating the given $interval to the class DateInterval

doc.description: Define the property $interval instantiating the given $interval to the class DateInterval

setInterval.comments:
/**
   * Define the property $interval instantiating the given $interval to the class DateInterval 
   * 
   *
   * @param string $interval allowed http://php.net/manual/en/dateinterval.construct.php
   * @return void
   */

getInterval.summary: Return the property $interval if it is set

doc.description: Return the property $interval if it is set

getInterval.comments:
/**
   * Return the property $interval if it is set
   * 
   * @param string $interval

   */

format.name: format
format.summary: return the date in the given $format of in 'Y-m-d H:i:s' format if no argument is given to the function

doc.description: return the date in the given $format of in 'Y-m-d H:i:s' format if no argument is given to the function

format.comments:
/**
   * return the date in the given $format of in 'Y-m-d H:i:s' format if no argument is given to the function
   *
   * @param string $format
   * @return void
   */

compare.name: compare

arguments.name: date
arguments.description: the string of the date to compare or an object of this class

params.name: $date
params.description: the string of the date to compare or an object of this class

compare.comments:
/**
   * Compares two dates
   *
   * @param String|Object $date the string of the date to compare or an object of this class
   * @param string $comparator allowed comparators '>','>=', '<','<=', '='
   * @return Boolean
   */

isBefore.name: isBefore
isBefore.summary: Return if $this->time is before of the given $date

arguments.name: date
arguments.description: the string of the date to compare or an object of this class

   * @param String|Object $date the string of the date to compare or an object of this class

isAfter.name: isAfter
isAfter.summary: Return if $this->time is after of the given $date

isSame.name: isSame
isSame.summary: Return if $this->time is the same of the given $date

add.name: add
add.summary: Add an the given $interval to $this->time and return a reference to the original object
add.description: If the argument $format is not given it returns the sql format 'Y-m-d H:i:s'

description_parts.content: If the argument $format is not given it returns the sql format 'Y-m-d H:i:s'

doc.description:
Add an the given $interval to $this->time and return a reference to the original object
If the argument $format is not given it returns the sql format 'Y-m-d H:i:s'

add.comments:

   * 
   * @param string $interval
   * @param string $format optional
   * @return void
   */

sub.name: sub
sub.summary: Subtract the given $interval to $this->time and return a reference to the original object
